DOC.brief_summary: To compare total analgesic use 24 hour arthroscopic knee surgery celecoxib-treated versus placebo-treated patient
DOC.brief_title: Effect Celecoxib Versus Placebo Before After Knee Surgery Overall Use Analgesics After Surgery
